title: conferred on it by section 31 of the Health and Social Care Professionals Act
heading: 1. (1) This bye-law may be cited as the Election of Members for
text_raw:
1. (1) This bye-law may be cited as the Election of Members for 
Appointment to the Occupational Therapists Registration Board (Amendment) 
Bye-law 2024. 

(2) The Principal Bye-law and this bye-law may be cited together as the 
Election of Members for Appointment to the Occupational Therapists 
Registration Board Bye-laws 2023 and 2024.
text_norm: 1 (1) bye-law may cited election member appointment occupational therapist registration board (amendment) bye-law 2024 (2) principal bye-law bye-law may cited together election member appointment occupational therapist registration board bye-laws 2023 2024

title: conferred on it by section 31 of the Health and Social Care Professionals Act
heading: 2. (1) In this bye-law “Principal Bye-Law” means the Election of Members
text_raw:
2. (1) In this bye-law “Principal Bye-Law” means the Election of Members 
for Appointment to the Occupational Therapists Registration Board Bye-law 
2023 (S.I. No. 358 of 2023).
text_norm: 2 (1) bye-law principal bye-law mean election member appointment occupational therapist registration board bye-law 2023 (s.i no 358 2023)

title: conferred on it by section 31 of the Health and Social Care Professionals Act
heading: 3. Paragraph 7 of the Principal Bye-Law is amended in subparagraph (2)
text_raw:
3. Paragraph 7 of the Principal Bye-Law is amended in subparagraph (2) 

by substituting “23” for “24”.
text_norm: 3 paragraph 7 principal bye-law amended subparagraph (2) substituting 23 24

title: conferred on it by section 31 of the Health and Social Care Professionals Act
heading: 4. The Election of Members for Appointment to the Occupational
text_raw:
4. The Election of Members for Appointment to the Occupational 
Therapists Registration Board Bye-law 2016 (S.I. No. 480 of 2016) is revoked. 

GIVEN under the seal of the Occupational Therapists 
Registration Board, 
23 January, 2024. 

ANN SHEEHAN, 

Chairperson, Occupational Therapists Registration Board. 

JOHN HANILY, 

Member, Occupational Therapists Registration Board. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 26th January, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 EXPLANATORY NOTE 

[16] 3 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This bye-law corrects a typographical error in paragraph 7(2) of the Election of 
Members for Appointment to the Occupational Therapists Registration Board 
Bye-law 2023. 

This bye-law also revokes the Election of Members for Appointment to the 
Occupational Therapists Registration Board Bye-law 2016 (S.I. No. 480 of 
2016). 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [16]
